definitions: a device used for spreading or scattering a substance over a wide area.
shortDefinitions: device used for spreading or scattering substance over wide area

definitions: a person who spreads or disseminates something

examples.text: children are major spreaders of influenza in schools

shortDefinitions: person who spreads or disseminates something

definitions: a device that spreads apart one thing from another
shortDefinitions: device that spreads apart one thing from another

definitions: a bar attached to the mast of a yacht in order to spread the angle of the upper shrouds.
shortDefinitions: bar attached to mast of yacht
